DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study establish single multiple-dose pharmacokinetics ( PK ) sublingual administration Sufentanil Sublingual Microtablet ( SSM ) 30 mcg compare pharmacokinetics single dose SSM 30 mcg 2 dos SSM 15 mcg administer 20 minute apart .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Sufentanil Sublingual Microtablet 30 mcg 15 mcg Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: 1 . Nonsmoking male female subject 2 . Aged 18 45 year inclusive 3 . Subjects must Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18 30 , inclusively . 1 . Subjects take overthecounter medication ( except single dose multivitamin supplement acetaminophen less 2 g/day ) within 14 day prior start sufentanil dose prescription medication counter ( OTC ) medication 2 . Female subject pregnant 3 . Subjects chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , sleep apnea , significant respiratory disorder
